df-psmet
blocks.content: Define the set of all pseudometrics on a given base set. In a pseudo metric, two distinct points may have a distance zero. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-psmet(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cpsmet, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cv(s0), wa(wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s2)), nat0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wral(s4, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cle, co(co(cv(s4), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cxad, co(cv(s4), cv(s1), cv(s3)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-psmet(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ PsMet =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà(‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](s0 √ó s0))| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0,((s2[s1]s2)= 0 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s0,(s2[s1]s3)[‚â§]((s4[s1]s2)[+](s4[s1]s3))))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-xmet
blocks.content: Define the set of all extended metrics on a given base set. The definition is similar to ~ df-met , but we also allow the metric to take on the value ` +oo ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-xmet(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cxmet, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, co(cxr, cmap, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), nat0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wral(s4, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cle, co(co(cv(s4), cv(s1), cv(s2)), cxad, co(cv(s4), cv(s1), cv(s3)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-xmet(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ *Met =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà(‚Ñù*[‚Ü¶](s0 √ó s0))| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0,(((s2[s1]s3)= 0 ‚Üî s2 = s3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s0,(s2[s1]s3)[‚â§]((s4[s1]s2)[+](s4[s1]s3))))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-met
blocks.content: Define the (proper) class of all metrics. (A metric space is the metric's base set paired with the metric; see ~ df-ms . However, we will often also call the metric itself a "metric space".) Equivalent to Definition 14-1.1 of [Gleason] p. 223. The 4 properties in Gleason's definition are shown by ~ met0 , ~ metgt0 , ~ metsym , and ~ mettri . (Contributed by NM, 25-Aug-2006.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-met(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  |- wceq(cmet, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, co(cr, cmap, cxp(cv(s0), cv(s0))), wral(s2, cv(s0), wral(s3, cv(s0), wa(wb(wceq(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), nat0), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wral(s4, cv(s0), wbr(co(cv(s2), cv(s1), cv(s3)), cle, co(co(cv(s4), cv(s1), cv(s2)), caddc, co(cv(s4), cv(s1), cv(s3)))))))))))
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-met(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4) {
  ‚ä¢ Met =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà(‚Ñù[‚Ü¶](s0 √ó s0))| ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s0, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s0,(((s2[s1]s3)= 0 ‚Üî s2 = s3)‚àß ‚àÄ(s4 ‚àà s0,(s2[s1]s3)[‚â§]((s4[s1]s2)[+](s4[s1]s3))))))})
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s3, s4)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-bl
blocks.content: Define the metric space ball function. See ~ blval for its value. (Contributed by NM, 30-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Feb-2018.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-bl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cbl, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpo(s1, s2, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), cxr, crab(s3, cdm(cdm(cv(s0))), wbr(co(cv(s1), cv(s0), cv(s3)), clt, cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-bl(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ ball =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà dom(dom(s0)), s2 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚Ü¶ { s3 ‚àà dom(dom(s0))|(s1[s0]s3)[<]s2 }))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: df-mopn
blocks.content: Define a function whose value is the family of open sets of a metric space. See ~ elmopn for its main property. (Contributed by NM, 1-Sep-2006.)

blocks.name: df-fbas
blocks.content: Define the class of all filter bases. Note that a filter base on one set is also a filter base for any superset, so there is not a unique base set that can be recovered. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 1-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 11-Jul-2015.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-fbas(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  |- wceq(cfbas, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cpw(cpw(cv(s0))), w3a(wne(cv(s1), emptycls), wnel(emptycls, cv(s1)), wral(s2, cv(s1), wral(s3, cv(s1), wne(cin(cv(s1), cpw(cin(cv(s2), cv(s3)))), emptycls)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom df-fbas(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3) {
  ‚ä¢ fBas =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶ { s1 ‚àà P(P(s0))|(s1 ‚â† ‚àÖ ‚àß ‚àÖ ‚àâ s1 ‚àß ‚àÄ(s2 ‚àà s1, ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà s1,(s1 ‚ãÇ P((s2 ‚ãÇ s3)))‚â† ‚àÖ)))})
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, s3)
  ‚ä£ d(s2, s3)
}

blocks.name: ccnfld
blocks.content: Extend class notation with the field of complex numbers.
blocks.origin: const class ccnfld { CCfld }

blocks.name: diff.ccnfld.s
diff.ccnfld.c
diff.ccnfld.w
df-cnfld
blocks.content: The field of complex numbers. Other number fields and rings can be constructed by applying the ` |``s ` restriction operator, for instance ` ( CCfld |`` AA ) ` is the field of algebraic numbers. The contract of this set is defined entirely by ~ cnfldex , ~ cnfldadd , ~ cnfldmul , ~ cnfldcj , ~ cnfldtset , ~ cnfldle , ~ cnfldds , and ~ cnfldbas . We may add additional members to this in the future. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 15-Dec-2017.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: cnfldstr
blocks.content: The field of complex numbers is a structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnfldstr() {
  |- wbr(ccnfld, cstr, cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat3)))
} = {
  eqbrtri(ccnfld, cstr, cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat3)), cun(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), csn(cop(cfv(cstv, cnx), ccj))), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), csn(cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin)))))))
  df-cnfld()
  strleun(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), csn(cop(cfv(cstv, cnx), ccj))), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), csn(cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin))))), nat1, cdc(nat1, nat3), nat4, nat9)
  srngstr(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), csn(cop(cfv(cstv, cnx), ccj))), cc, caddc, cmul, ccj)
  eqid(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), csn(cop(cfv(cstv, cnx), ccj))))
  strleun(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), csn(cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin)))), nat9, cdc(nat1, nat3), cdc(nat1, nat2), cdc(nat1, nat3))
  strle3(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin)), cfv(cple, cnx), cle, cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin), nat9, cdc(nat1, nat2), cdc(nat1, nat0))
  9nn()
  tsetndx()
  9lt10()
  10nn()
  plendx()
  declt(nat1, nat0, nat2)
  0nn0()
  2pos()
  decnncl(nat1, nat2)
  2nn()
  dsndx()
  strle1(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin)), cdc(nat1, nat3))
  decnncl(nat1, nat3)
  unifndx()
  declt(nat1, nat2, nat3)
  1nn0()
  2nn0()
  3nn()
  2lt3()
  4lt9()
}

blocks.name: cnfldbas
blocks.content: The base set of the field of complex numbers. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnfldbas() {
  |- wceq(cc, cfv(cbs, ccnfld))
} = {
  ax-mp(wceq(cc, cfv(cbs, ccnfld)), wcel(cc, universe))
  cnex()
  strfv(cc, universe, cbs, ccnfld, cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat3)))
  cnfldstr()
  baseid()
  sstri(csn(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc)), ccnfld, ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)))
  snsstp1(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul))
  sstri(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), ccnfld, cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), csn(cop(cfv(cstv, cnx), ccj))))
  ssun1(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), csn(cop(cfv(cstv, cnx), ccj)))
  sseqtr4i(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), csn(cop(cfv(cstv, cnx), ccj))), ccnfld, cun(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), csn(cop(cfv(cstv, cnx), ccj))), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), csn(cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin)))))))
  ssun1(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), csn(cop(cfv(cstv, cnx), ccj))), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), csn(cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin))))))
  df-cnfld()
}

  ssun1(({ <(Base ` ndx), ‚ÑÇ >, <(+ ` ndx), + >, <(√ó ` ndx), √ó > } ‚ãÉ { <(*r ` ndx), * > }), ({ <(TopSet ` ndx),(MetOpen `(abs ‚àò -))>, <(le ` ndx), ‚â§ >, <(dist ` ndx),(abs ‚àò -)> } ‚ãÉ { <(UnifSet ` ndx),(metUnif `(abs ‚àò -))> }))
  df-cnfld()

blocks.name: cnfldle
blocks.content: The ordering of the field of complex numbers. (Note that this is not actually an ordering on ` CC ` , but we put it in the structure anyway because restricting to ` RR ` does not affect this component, so that ` ( CCfld |``s RR ) ` is an ordered field even though ` CCfld ` itself is not.) blocks.content: The metric of the field of complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Aug-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 6-Oct-2015.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnfldds() {
  |- wceq(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(cds, ccnfld))
} = {
  ax-mp(wceq(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(cds, ccnfld)), wcel(ccom(cabs, cmin), universe))
  mp3an(wcel(ccom(cabs, cmin), universe), wf(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cc, cc), cr), wcel(cxp(cc, cc), universe), wcel(cr, universe))
  mp2an(wf(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cc, cc), cr), wf(cabs, cc, cr), wf(cmin, cxp(cc, cc), cc))
  absf()
  subf()
  fco(cabs, cc, cr, cmin, cxp(cc, cc))
  xpex(cc, cc)
  cnex()
  reex()
  fex2(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(cc, cc), cr, universe, universe)
  strfv(ccom(cabs, cmin), universe, cds, ccnfld, cop(nat1, cdc(nat1, nat3)))
  cnfldstr()
  dsid()
  sstri(csn(cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), ccnfld, ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))))
  snsstp3(cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin)), cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle))
  sstri(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), ccnfld, cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), csn(cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin))))))
  ssun1(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), csn(cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin)))))
  sseqtr4i(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), csn(cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin))))), ccnfld, cun(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), csn(cop(cfv(cstv, cnx), ccj))), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), csn(cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin)))))))
  ssun2(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), csn(cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin))))), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), csn(cop(cfv(cstv, cnx), ccj))))
  df-cnfld()
}

  sseqtr4i(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), csn(cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin))))), ccnfld, cun(cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cbs, cnx), cc), cop(cfv(cplusg, cnx), caddc), cop(cfv(cmulr, cnx), cmul)), csn(cop(cfv(cstv, cnx), ccj))), cun(ctp(cop(cfv(cts, cnx), cfv(cmopn, ccom(cabs, cmin))), cop(cfv(cple, cnx), cle), cop(cfv(cds, cnx), ccom(cabs, cmin))), csn(cop(cfv(cunif, cnx), cfv(cmetu, ccom(cabs, cmin)))))))

blocks.origin:
thm cncrng() {
  |- wcel(ccnfld, ccrg)
} = {
  mptru(wcel(ccnfld, ccrg))
  iscrngd(hs0, hs1, hs2, ccnfld, cc, caddc, cmul, nat1, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cc, cfv(cbs, ccnfld)))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(caddc, cfv(cplusg, ccnfld)))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cmul, cfv(cmulr, ccnfld)))
  cnfldmul()
  a1i(wtru, wcel(ccnfld, cgrp))
  isgrpi(hs0, hs1, hs2, ccnfld, cc, caddc, nat0, cneg(cv(hs0)))
  cnfldbas()
  cnfldadd()
  addcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  addass(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  0cn()
  addid2(cv(hs0))
  eqtrd(co(cneg(cv(hs0)), caddc, cv(hs0)), nat0, co(cv(hs0), caddc, cneg(cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cc))
  mpancom(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cneg(cv(hs0)), caddc, cv(hs0)), co(cv(hs0), caddc, cneg(cv(hs0)))), wcel(cneg(cv(hs0)), cc))
  negcl(cv(hs0))
  addcom(cneg(cv(hs0)), cv(hs0))
  negid(cv(hs0))
  3adant1(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cc))
  mulcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(wtru, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(cv(hs2), cc)), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), cmul, cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs2)))))
  mulass(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  adantl(wtru, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(cv(hs2), cc)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs2)))))
  adddi(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  adantl(wtru, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wcel(cv(hs2), cc)), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cmul, cv(hs2)), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs2)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs2)))))
  adddir(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  1cnd(wtru)
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(nat1, cmul, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  mulid2(cv(hs0))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat1), cv(hs0)))
  mulid1(cv(hs0))
  3adant1(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cc), wcel(cv(hs1), cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs0))))
  mulcom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnfld)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs1.c(ccnfld)
  diff.hs1.c(cc)
  diff.hs2.c(ccnfld)
  diff.hs2.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
  diff.hs2.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.c(caddc)
  diff.hs0.c(nat0)
  diff.hs1.c(caddc)
  diff.hs1.c(nat0)
  diff.hs1.c(cneg(cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs2.c(caddc)
  diff.hs2.c(nat0)
}

} = {

  mulass(hs0, hs1, hs2)

  adddi(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  adantl(wtru, (hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ ‚àß hs2 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ), ((hs0[+]hs1)[√ó]hs2)=((hs0[√ó]hs2)[+](hs1[√ó]hs2)))
  adddir(hs0, hs1, hs2)
  1cnd(wtru)
  adantl(wtru, hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (1[√ó]hs0)= hs0)
  mulid2(hs0)
  adantl(wtru, hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (hs0[√ó]1)= hs0)
  mulid1(hs0)
  3adant1(wtru, hs0 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (hs0[√ó]hs1)=(hs1[√ó]hs0))
  mulcom(hs0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(ccnfld)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)

  diff.hs2.c(ccnfld)

blocks.name: xrsmcmn
blocks.content: The "multiplicative group" of the extended reals is a commutative monoid (even though the "additive group" is not a semigroup, see ~ xrsmgmdifsgrp .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Aug-2015.)

thm xrsmcmn() {
  |- wcel(cfv(cmgp, cxrs), ccmn)
} = {
  mptru(wcel(cfv(cmgp, cxrs), ccmn))
  iscmnd(hs0, hs1, cfv(cmgp, cxrs), cxr, cxmu, wtru)
  ismndd(hs0, hs1, hs2, cfv(cmgp, cxrs), cxr, cxmu, nat1, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cxr, cfv(cbs, cfv(cmgp, cxrs))))
  mgpbas(cxr, cfv(cmgp, cxrs), cxrs)
  xrsbas()
  a1i(wtru, wceq(cxmu, cfv(cplusg, cfv(cmgp, cxrs))))
  mgpplusg(cxmu, cfv(cmgp, cxrs), cxrs)
  eqid(cfv(cmgp, cxrs))
  xrsmul()
  3adant1(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr), wcel(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, cv(hs1)), cxr))
  xmulcl(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  adantl(wtru, w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr), wcel(cv(hs2), cxr)), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, cv(hs1)), cxmu, cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), cxmu, co(cv(hs1), cxmu, cv(hs2)))))
  xmulass(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), cv(hs2))
  mp1i(wtru, wcel(nat1, cxr), wcel(nat1, cr))
  1re()
  rexr(nat1)
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(nat1, cxmu, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)))
  xmulid2(cv(hs0))
  adantl(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, nat1), cv(hs0)))
  xmulid1(cv(hs0))
  3adant1(wtru, wcel(cv(hs0), cxr), wcel(cv(hs1), cxr), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cxmu, cv(hs1)), co(cv(hs1), cxmu, cv(hs0))))
  xmulcom(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmgp, cxrs))
  diff.hs0.c(cxr)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cmgp, cxrs))
  diff.hs1.c(cxr)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs1.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(nat1)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cmgp, cxrs))
  diff.hs2.c(cxr)
  diff.hs2.w(wtru)
}

thm cnfldmulg(class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§ ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)‚Üí(c0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=(c0[√ó]c1))
} = {
  impcom(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñ§, c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (c0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=(c0[√ó]c1))
  zindd(hs0, hs1, c0, c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (c0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=(c0[√ó]c1), (hs0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=(hs0[√ó]c1), (0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=(0[√ó]c1), (hs1[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=(hs1[√ó]c1), ((hs1[+]1)[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=((hs1[+]1)[√ó]c1), (-u(hs1)[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=(-u(hs1)[√ó]c1))
  eqeq12d((hs0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (hs0[√ó]c1), (0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (0[√ó]c1), hs0 = 0)
  oveq1(hs0, nat0, (.g ` CCfld), c1)

  eqeq12d((hs0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (hs0[√ó]c1), (hs1[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (hs1[√ó]c1), hs0 = hs1)
  oveq1(hs0, hs1, (.g ` CCfld), c1)
  oveq1(hs0, hs1, cmul, c1)
  eqeq12d((hs0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (hs0[√ó]c1), ((hs1[+]1)[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), ((hs1[+]1)[√ó]c1), hs0 =(hs1[+]1))
  oveq1(hs0, (hs1[+]1), (.g ` CCfld), c1)
  oveq1(hs0, (hs1[+]1), cmul, c1)
  eqeq12d((hs0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (hs0[√ó]c1), (-u(hs1)[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (-u(hs1)[√ó]c1), hs0 = -u(hs1))
  oveq1(hs0, -u(hs1), (.g ` CCfld), c1)
  oveq1(hs0, -u(hs1), cmul, c1)
  eqeq12d((hs0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (hs0[√ó]c1), (c0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (c0[√ó]c1), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, (.g ` CCfld), c1)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, cmul, c1)
  eqtr4d((0[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (0[√ó]c1), nat0, c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  mulg0(c1, cc, (.g ` CCfld), nat0, ccnfld)
  cnfld0()
  mul02(c1)
  expcom(c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, ((hs1[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=(hs1[√ó]c1)‚Üí((hs1[+]1)[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=((hs1[+]1)[√ó]c1)))
  syl5ibr((hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ), (hs1[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=(hs1[√ó]c1), ((hs1[+]1)[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=((hs1[+]1)[√ó]c1), ((hs1[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)[+]c1)=((hs1[√ó]c1)[+]c1))
  oveq1((hs1[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (hs1[√ó]c1), caddc, c1)
  eqeq12d(((hs1[+]1)[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), ((hs1[+]1)[√ó]c1), ((hs1[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)[+]c1), ((hs1[√ó]c1)[+]c1), (hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))
  mp3an1(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0, c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, ((hs1[+]1)[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=((hs1[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)[+]c1), CCfld ‚àà Mnd)
  ax-mp(CCfld ‚àà Mnd, CCfld ‚àà Ring)
  cnring()
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  mulgnn0p1(ccnfld, hs1, c1, cc, (.g ` CCfld), caddc)
  cnfldadd()
  adddirp1d(hs1, c1, (hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï0 ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))

  eqeq12d((-u(hs1)[(.g ` CCfld)]c1), (-u(hs1)[√ó]c1), ((invg ` CCfld)`(hs1[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)), ((invg ` CCfld)`(hs1[√ó]c1)), (hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ))

  sylan(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (-u(hs1)[√ó]c1)= -u((hs1[√ó]c1)), hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  mulneg1(hs1, c1)
  syl((hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ), ((invg ` CCfld)`(hs1[√ó]c1))= -u((hs1[√ó]c1)), (hs1[√ó]c1)‚àà ‚ÑÇ)
  sylan(hs1 ‚àà ‚Ñï, c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ, (hs1[√ó]c1)‚àà ‚ÑÇ, hs1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)

  cnfldneg((hs1[√ó]c1))
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ‚àà ‚ÑÇ)

  diff.hs0.w((-u(hs1)[(.g ` CCfld)]c1)=(-u(hs1)[√ó]c1))

  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), c0), co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), c0), co(c0, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), c0), co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), co(co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), c0), co(c0, cexp, co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)), wceq(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1)))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), c0)
  oveq2(cv(hs0), co(cv(hs1), caddc, nat1), c0, cexp)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(c0, cc), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), c0), co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), c0), co(c0, cexp, c1)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), c0), co(c0, cexp, cv(hs0)), co(c1, cfv(cmg, cfv(cmgp, ccnfld)), c0), co(c0, cexp, c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))

blocks.name: xrsmgmdifsgrp
blocks.content: The "additive group" of the extended reals is a magma but not a semigroup, and therefore also not a monoid nor a group, in contrast to the "multiplicative group", see ~ xrsmcmn . (Contributed by AV, 30-Jan-2020.)

blocks.name: xrs1mnd
blocks.content: The extended real numbers, restricted to ` RR* \ { -oo } ` , form an additive monoid - in contrast to the full structure, see ~ xrsmgmdifsgrp . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrs1mnd(class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, cmnd)
  -| wceq(c0, co(cxrs, cress, cdif(cxr, csn(cmnf))))

blocks.name: xrsdsreclb
blocks.content: The metric of the extended real number structure is only real when both arguments are real. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)

thm xrsdsreclb(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1)), wb(wcel(co(c0, c2, c1), cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cds, cxrs))
} = {
  impbid1(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1)), wcel(co(c0, c2, c1), cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  sylbid(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1)), wcel(co(c0, c2, c1), cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cif(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cr))
  eleq1d(co(c0, c2, c1), cr, cif(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1)))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1), wceq(co(c0, c2, c1), cif(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))))
  xrsdsval(c0, c1, c2)
  ifbothda(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1)), wi(wcel(cif(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wi(wcel(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))), wi(wcel(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))))
  imbi1d(wceq(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), cif(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wcel(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cif(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cr))
  eleq1(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), cif(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cr)
  imbi1d(wceq(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), cif(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1))), wcel(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(cif(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cr))
  eleq1(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), cif(co(c1, cxad, cxne(c0)), co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1)), cr)
  xrsdsreclblem(c0, c1, c2)
  syldan(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1)), wn(wbr(c0, cle, c1)), wi(wcel(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  orcanai(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1)), wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0))
  3adant3(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1), wo(wbr(c0, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c0)))
  xrletri(c0, c1)
  syl6ib(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, c0)), wcel(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), cr), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr)))
  sylanb(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, c0), wi(wcel(co(c0, cxad, cxne(c1)), cr), wa(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c1, c0)))
  bitri(w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1)), w3a(wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c0, cxr), wne(c1, c0)), w3a(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, c0)))
  3anbi3i(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c0, c1), wne(c1, c0))
  necom(c0, c1)
  3ancoma(wcel(c0, cxr), wcel(c1, cxr), wne(c1, c0))
  xrsdsreclblem(c1, c0, c2)
  ancom(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c0, cr))
  eqeltrd(co(c0, c2, c1), cr, cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  xrsdsreval(c0, c1, c2)
  abscld(co(c0, cmin, c1), wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)))
  syl2an(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr), wcel(co(c0, cmin, c1), cc), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))
  recn(c0)
  recn(c1)
  subcl(c0, c1)
}

  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0 ‚â† c1)‚Üí((c0[c2]c1)‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Üî(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)))

  xrsdsval(c0, c1, c2)
  ifbothda((c1[+]-e(c0)), (c0[+]-e(c1)), (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0 ‚â† c1), (if(c0[‚â§]c1,(c1[+]-e(c0)),(c0[+]-e(c1)))‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)), c0[‚â§]c1, ((c1[+]-e(c0))‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)), ((c0[+]-e(c1))‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)))
  imbi1d((c1[+]-e(c0))= if(c0[‚â§]c1,(c1[+]-e(c0)),(c0[+]-e(c1))), (c1[+]-e(c0))‚àà ‚Ñù, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), if(c0[‚â§]c1,(c1[+]-e(c0)),(c0[+]-e(c1)))‚àà ‚Ñù)
  eleq1((c1[+]-e(c0)), if(c0[‚â§]c1,(c1[+]-e(c0)),(c0[+]-e(c1))), cr)
  imbi1d((c0[+]-e(c1))= if(c0[‚â§]c1,(c1[+]-e(c0)),(c0[+]-e(c1))), (c0[+]-e(c1))‚àà ‚Ñù, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), if(c0[‚â§]c1,(c1[+]-e(c0)),(c0[+]-e(c1)))‚àà ‚Ñù)
  eleq1((c0[+]-e(c1)), if(c0[‚â§]c1,(c1[+]-e(c0)),(c0[+]-e(c1))), cr)
  xrsdsreclblem(c0, c1, c2)
  syldan((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0 ‚â† c1), ¬¨ c0[‚â§]c1, ((c0[+]-e(c1))‚àà ‚Ñù ‚Üí(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù)), c1[‚â§]c0)
  orcanai((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0 ‚â† c1), c0[‚â§]c1, c1[‚â§]c0)
  3adant3(c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù*, c0 ‚â† c1, (c0[‚â§]c1 ‚à® c1[‚â§]c0))
  xrletri(c0, c1)
  syl6ib(((c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù* ‚àß c0 ‚â† c1)‚àß c1[‚â§]c0), (c0[+]-e(c1))‚àà ‚Ñù, (c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù), (c1 ‚àà ‚Ñù ‚àß c0 ‚àà ‚Ñù))

thm cnsubmlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, ccnfld))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| wcel(nat0, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpbir3an(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, ccnfld)), wss(c0, cc), wcel(nat0, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c0))))
  ssriv(s0, c0, cc)
  rgen2a(s0, s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c0))
  mp2b(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmnd, ccnfld)), w3a(wss(c0, cc), wcel(nat0, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c0))))), wcel(ccnfld, crg), wcel(ccnfld, cmnd))
  cnring()
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  issubm(s0, s1, ccnfld, c0, cc, nat0, caddc)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfld0()
  cnfldadd()
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s0)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s1)
}

thm cnsubglem(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {

  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cneg(cv(s0)), c0))
  -| wcel(c1, c0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  mpbir3an(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), wss(c0, cc), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c0)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), cv(s0)), c0))))
  ssriv(s0, c0, cc)
  ne0ii(c0, c1)
  rgen(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c0)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), cv(s0)), c0)))
  jca(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c0)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), cv(s0)), c0))
  ralrimiva(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c0))
  eqeltrd(cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), cv(s0)), c0, cneg(cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), cv(s0)), cneg(cv(s0))), wcel(cv(s0), cc))
  cnfldneg(cv(s0))
  mp2b(wb(wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, ccnfld)), w3a(wss(c0, cc), wne(c0, emptycls), wral(s0, c0, wa(wral(s1, c0, wcel(co(cv(s0), caddc, cv(s1)), c0)), wcel(cfv(cfv(cminusg, ccnfld), cv(s0)), c0))))), wcel(ccnfld, crg), wcel(ccnfld, cgrp))

blocks.name: cnmgpabl

  gzsubrg()
  subrgunit(cgz, ccnfld, c0, (Unit ` c1), (‚ÑÇ \ { 0 }), (invr ` CCfld), c1)
  drngui(cc, nat0, ccnfld)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfld0()
  cndrng()
  eqid((Unit ` c1))
  eqid((invr ` CCfld))
}

blocks.name: gsumfsum
blocks.content: Relate a group sum on ` CCfld ` to a finite sum on the complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)

thm gsumfsum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, c1)))

  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cc))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  mpjaod(w0, wceq(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, c1)), wceq(c0, emptycls), wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wex(hs0, wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))))

  oveq2d(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), emptycls, wceq(c0, emptycls))
  syl6eq(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), emptycls, cmpt(s0, emptycls, c1), wceq(c0, emptycls))
  mpteq1(s0, c0, emptycls, c1)
  mpt0(s0, c1)
  eqtr4i(co(ccnfld, cgsu, emptycls), csu(s0, emptycls, c1), nat0)
  gsum0(ccnfld, nat0)

  exlimdv(hs0, wa(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn)), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0), wceq(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, c1)))

  eqtr4d(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, c0)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))))
  gsumval3(ccnfld, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), caddc, cv(hs0), cfv(chash, c0), cc, nat0, cfv(ccntz, ccnfld), c0, cfn, co(ccom(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), csupp, nat0), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))))
  cnfld0()
  cnfldadd()
  mp1i(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))), wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
  ringmnd(ccnfld)
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0)), wcel(c0, cfn))
  cntzcmnf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cfv(ccntz, ccnfld), cc, ccnfld, c0, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))))
  cnfldbas()

  eqid(co(ccom(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0)), csupp, nat0))
  syl5eqr(csu(s0, c0, c1), cfv(cseq(nat1, caddc, ccom(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs0))), cfv(chash, c0)), csu(hs1, c0, cfv(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), cv(hs1))), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))))
  sumfc(hs1, s0, c0, c1)

  fveq2(cv(hs1), cfv(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), cmpt(s0, c0, c1))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))

  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0)), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, cc))

  syl(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))), wf(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c0), cn), wf1o(cv(hs0), co(nat1, cfz, cfv(chash, c0)), c0))

blocks.name: regsumfsum
blocks.content: Relate a group sum on ` ( CCfld |``s RR ) ` to a finite sum on the reals. Cf. ~ gsumfsum . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 7-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm regsumfsum(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfn))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, cr))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(co(ccnfld, cress, cr), cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), csu(s0, c0, c1), co(ccnfld, cgsu, cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), w0)
  gsumress(hs0, ccnfld, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(ccnfld, cress, cr), cc, caddc, cr, universe, c0, cfn, nat0, w0)
  cnfldbas()
  cnfldadd()
  eqid(co(ccnfld, cress, cr))
  a1i(w0, wcel(ccnfld, universe))
  cnfldex()
  a1i(w0, wss(cr, cc))
  ax-resscn()
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, cr, w0)
  0red(w0)
  jca(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cc)), wceq(co(nat0, caddc, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), caddc, nat0), cv(hs0)))
  addid2d(cv(hs0), wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cc)))

blocks.name: nn0srg
blocks.content: The nonnegative integers form a semiring (commutative by ~ subcmn ). (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 1-May-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm nn0srg() {
  |- wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cn0), csrg)
} = {
  mpbir3an(wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cn0), csrg), wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cn0), ccmn), wcel(cfv(cmgp, co(ccnfld, cress, cn0)), cmnd), wral(hs0, cn0, wa(wral(hs1, cn0, wral(hs2, cn0, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, co(cv(hs1), caddc, cv(hs2))), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs1)), caddc, co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs2)))), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), caddc, cv(hs1)), cmul, cv(hs2)), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, cv(hs2)), caddc, co(cv(hs1), cmul, cv(hs2))))))), wa(wceq(co(nat0, cmul, cv(hs0)), nat0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat0), nat0)))))
  mp2an(wcel(co(ccnfld, cress, cn0), ccmn), wcel(ccnfld, ccmn), wcel(cn0, cfv(csubmnd, ccnfld)))
  nn0subm()
  submcmn(ccnfld, cn0, co(ccnfld, cress, cn0))
  eqeltrri(cfv(cmgp, co(ccnfld, cress, cn0)), cmnd, co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cn0))
  mp2an(wceq(co(cfv(cmgp, ccnfld), cress, cn0), cfv(cmgp, co(ccnfld, cress, cn0))), wcel(ccnfld, ccmn), wcel(cn0, universe))
  ax-mp(wcel(ccnfld, ccmn), wcel(ccnfld, crg))
